item.title: Neurovascular network modeling using ANVNs
item.description: Using Artificial Neuro Vascular Networks (ANVNs) to understand the vascular network and to study the Blood Brain Barrier (BBB) plasticity in normal brain and pathological conditions.

item.title: Encoding Temporal Relations using Complex-Valued Synapses
Do tuned responses in cerebral microvessels imply lateral interactions among vessels? A computational study
Network level neuro-glial-vascular interaction
item.description: A network level implementation of neuro-glial-vascular interactions

item.title: Neurovascular network modeling using GCAL architecture
item.description: Exploring neurovascular network using an interactive GCAL architecture, to analyze the vascular network connectivity.

item.title: A Network Architecture for Bidirectional Neurovascular Coupling in Rat Whisker Barrel Cortex
Phase and Amplitude Modulation in a Neural Oscillatory Model of the Orientation Map

item.description: Exploring the use of coupled oscillators to explain neurovascular interactions.
